data.title: Charu Asopa, famous TV couples who got divorced
data.meta_description: From Rashmi Desai-Nandish Sandhu to Rajeev Sen-Charu Asopa, famous TV couples who got divorced
data.text:
In Pic

Karan Singh Grover and Jennifer Winget got married on April 9, 2012, after working together on the television show 'Dill Mill Gayye', where their on-screen chemistry translated into real-life love. Unfortunately, their marriage faced several challenges, and they decided to part ways

Karan and Jennifer got divorced in 2014

Karan Mehra and Nisha Rawal got married in 2012 and appeared to be a happy pair. They welcomed their first child, a son named Kavish, in 2017. However, after several years of marriage, they faced certain marital issues and disputes

In June 2021, an unfortunate incident occurred where Nisha Rawal accused Karan Mehra of domestic violence, which resulted in a police complaint being filed against him. Amidst the controversies, Karan Mehra and Nisha Rawal decided to separate. Their divorce proceedings were initiated in 2021

Delnaaz Irani and Rajeev Paul got married in 2005 after meeting on the sets of the TV show 'Parivartan'. However, after 14 years of marriage, they faced compatibility issues and personal differences, which eventually led to their separation

The couple decided to part ways, and their divorce was finalized in 2012

Charu Asopa and Rajeev Sen welcomed their first child - daughter Ziana - in 2021 after getting married in 2019. Soon, they announced separation and accused each other of cheating

After multiple failed attempts to make their marriage work, the couple got divorced in 2023

Vivian Dsena and Vahbiz Dorabjee got married in January 2013 after meeting on the sets of the TV show 'Pyaar Kii Ye Ek Kahaani'. However, after a few years of marriage, Vivian and Vahbiz faced compatibility issues and differences that led to problems in their relationship

The two tried to work on their marriage but eventually decided to part ways. The couple separated amicably, and their divorce was finalized in 2017

Rashami Desai and Nandish Sandhu got married in 2012. However, their marriage faced several ups and downs, and they encountered various personal and compatibility issues

The couple tried to work it out and even appeared on Nach Baliye. Despite attempts to reconcile, Rashami and Nandish eventually decided to part ways. They got separated in 2015, and their divorce was finalized in 2016

Dimpy Ganguly and Rahul Mahajan were a couple who got married on a reality show. They met on the reality show "Rahul Dulhaniya Le Jayega" in 2010. The two got married on the show itself. After the show, they continued their married life off-screen. However, their marriage faced several challenges, and they encountered personal issues and differences

Despite their efforts to make their marriage work, Dimpy and Rahul decided to part ways. They got separated in 2015, and their divorce was finalized that same year

Shweta Tiwari and Raja Chaudhary got married in 1998 and had a daughter named Palak Tiwari in 2000. However, their marriage faced numerous issues and controversies

The couple's relationship became tumultuous, and Shweta Tiwari had to face domestic violence and abuse in her marriage. Shweta and Raja officially divorced in 2007, putting an end to their troubled marriage
